_sText:
CSS free-for-all mode
This ffa mod is based on CSS:DM and you need maps only with Counter-Terror or Terror spawn points, but only one of this.
The different to normal maps is, that you have only one team and the round never ends, because there is no team winning the round. 
In fact you need some changes in the server config to disable team kill messages and sounds. It's also possible to remove counter or terror spawn points with the mod stripper, but it makes only trouble with your server.
It's also advantageous that it isn't round based and respawn all over the map after death.


Read the tutorial 
http://www.fpsbanana.com/tuts/8023 
befor install
this map is designed for CSS:DM Free-for-all mod
